
```{r}
library(MASS)  
data(Boston)
y=Boston$medv
x=as.matrix(Boston[, -which(names(Boston) == "medv")])
lm1=linear_regress(y,x)
PredictY(x,lm1[["Estimate"]])
```
